Html:
Hi,

Where can I find TypeScript compiler path to be used in VS projects. I know that tsc.exe esists in C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\0.9 but we cannot rely on this value since the version might change later. I search environment variables and registry and I did not find some thing suitable.

VS version: 2013
I installed TypeScript using TypeScriptSetup.1.0rc

Any help would be appreciated,
Thanks

Yes, it's in the Microsoft SDK folder.
(C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript)
But you can also see the full path to the TSC.EXE in the Path environment variable (make sure to restart the system first after installing - it didn't show in the command line for me until then).

I tried to restart the machine and I did not find the path to tsc.exe in the Path environment variable. (this is if i have only VS 2013 on the machine).

However, I tried to install it on a machine with both VS (2012, 2013) installed, I could find the path to the compiler added to path env. variables.

Other suggestions?

Thanks
